form.label: Music WIP
form.description: Searches i'm workshopping and want to save somewhere pretty

panel.title: Listens Over Time - Artists I've Purchased Tickets For

search.query: |inputlookup ticketpurchase.csv | rename concert_date as date | lookup concerts.csv date OUTPUT artist as lineup| makemv lineup delim="," | fillnull value="notyet" | mvexpand lineup | eval person=if(lineup="$artist$", lineup, artist) | dedup person | sort person

|inputlookup ticketpurchase.csv | rename concert_date as date | lookup concerts.csv date OUTPUT artist as lineup| makemv lineup delim="," | fillnull value="notyet" | mvexpand lineup | eval person=if(lineup="$artist$", lineup, artist) | search person="$artist$" | eval _time=strptime(purchase_date, "%B %d %Y") | eval annotation_label="$artist$ tickets purchased from ".site

panel.title: NOINPUT Listens Over Time - Artists I've Purchased Tickets For

search.query: |inputlookup ticketpurchase.csv | rename concert_date as date | lookup concerts.csv date OUTPUT artist as lineup| makemv lineup delim="," | fillnull value="notyet" | mvexpand lineup | eval person=if(lineup="Hey Rosetta!", lineup, artist) | search person="Hey Rosetta!" | eval _time=strptime(purchase_date, "%B %d %Y") | eval annotation_label="Hey Rosetta! tickets purchased from ".site

panel.title: Albums for an artist with Album Cover

search.query: `lastfm` | search artist="Death Cab For Cutie" | stats values(album.image) as album_cover, count by album | search album_cover!="" | mvexpand album_cover | search album_cover="*300x300*" | dedup album | rename album_cover as imageurl | strcat album " has " count " listen(s) " description | table imageurl description

`lastfm` | search NOT [| search tag=purchased earliest=1 latest=now | table artist,track_name ] | search earliest=1/1/2017:0:0:0 latest=now | stats count by track_name,artist | search count > 3 | sort -count

panel.title: Artists to See Live - Headliner Threshold

search.query: `lastfm` |search NOT [|inputlookup concerts.csv | makemv artist delim="," | mvexpand artist | table artist] |eval threshold=[|inputlookup headlinerthreshold.csv | table threshold | return $threshold] | stats values(threshold) as threshold, count by artist | where count > threshold |table artist,count | sort -count

panel.title: can set this in props and re-ingest data, or do a search time replacement on just track_name, artist, album, create a macro and call the macro all the time

table.title: this sed fixes the improper & extraction for itunes_xml data source

search.query: `itunes` tag=purchased track_name=Sushi* | rex mode=sed field=track_name "s/\&/\&/g" | stats count by artist track_name

panel.title: Songs listened to not in itunes library

search.query: `lastfm` | search NOT [search `itunes`| table track_name] | stats count

panel.title: Songs listened to in iTunes library
Actual number of songs in my iTunes library with files behind them
Transaction of times before adding song to library

search.query: index=music artist="Rubblebucket" | eval eventtime=strftime(_time, "%b %d %y, %H:%M") | transaction track_name endswith=(sourcetype=itunes_xml) | table track_name, artist, album, _time, eventtime, sourcetype

panel.title: REX extraction for blog sites in comments

search.query: `itunes` | search Comments ="www*" OR Comments = "*.com" OR Comments = "*.org" | eval site=lower(Comments) | stats count by site | sort -count | rex field=site "\/\/(?:[^@\/\n]+@)?(?:www\.)?(?<refdomain>[^:\/\n]+)" | rex field=site "(?<blog>(\d{1,3}.\d{1,3}?|[^\.\s]+?)\.([^\.\s]{1,3}|[^\.\s]{1,3}\.[^\.\s]{1,3}))$$"

`itunes` | table track_name, release_date,artist | appendcols [|search `lastfm` | stats count as listens by track_name| table track_name, listens] | eval release_date=round(strptime(release_date, "%Y-%m-%dT%M:%S:%fZ")) | eval time_out=round(((now()-release_date)/86400)) | eval normalized_interest=round((listens/time_out),2) | sort -normalized_interest

panel.title: Difference between when I first discovered them and when I saw them in concertâ€¦. but awkwardly not considering earlier concerts, so I need to limit it to artists I saw for the first time in 2018

search.query: |inputlookup concerts.csv | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time | search _time>1514764800 | makemv artist delim="," |mvexpand artist | fields artist,date | lookup earliestlistens.csv artist OUTPUT earliestlisten as first_discovered | eval diff=(_time-first_discovered) | eval first_discovered=strftime(first_discovered, "%B %d %Y"), diff=round(diff/86400) | fields - _time | rename date as concert_date | table artist,concert_date,first_discovered,diff | sort -diff

`lastfm_earliest` | search earliestyear=2018 | stats count by artist | sort -count limit=5 | lookup earliestlistens.csv artist OUTPUTNEW earliestlisten as first_discovered | eval first_discovered=strftime(first_discovered, "%m/%d/%Y:%H:%M:%S")
`lastfm` | search earliest=$before_discover$ latest=$after_discover$ | table artist track_name _time
